songs.embed_content: Read “I Don't Mind” by Nemo Schiffman on Genius
songs.full_title: I Don't Mind by Nemo Schiffman
songs.title: I Don’t Mind

annotatable.link_title: I Don’t Mind by Nemo Schiffman
annotatable.title: I Don't Mind

songs.full_title: Mashup 2017 by Bars and Melody (Ft. Nemo Schiffman)
songs.title: Mashup 2017

songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Done with all the blame
I’ll rise above the game
You won’t forget my name

[Verse 1]
I just woke up from a fever
I just woke up
I’m seeing everything clearer
I just woke up

I’m over trying to be
Somebody other than me
I’m over trying to fight
Just wanna party tonight

[Pre-Chorus]
Don’t tell me what to say
I don’t care anyway
Somebody needs to play the music
Friends are by my side
We’ve got nothing to hide
We’re young, we’re free, we’re proud to be alive

[Chorus]
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Done with all the blame
I’ll rise above the game
You won’t forget my name

[Verse 2]
Dance with me don’t be a hater
Raise your glass up
You are my favorite flavor
Raise your glass up

Laughing and feeling so high
Making out under the sky
Just wanna party tonight
We’re gonna party tonight

[Pre-Chorus]
Tomorrow’s far away
Let’s enjoy today
Lose yourself and play the music
Friends are by my side
We’ve got nothing to hide
We’re young, we’re free, we’re proud to be alive

[Chorus]
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Done with all the blame
I’ll rise above the game
You won’t forget my name

[Bridge]
Losing my patience, losing time
Trying so hard to read your mind
You want me to be better
Really believe you are clever
Whining, depriving me daily
Your drama is driving me crazy
But now I don’t mind

Yeah I don’t mind
Yeah I don’t mind

[Chorus]
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Tripping tonight
Live in the moment forever
Yeah I don’t mind
Done with all the blame
I’ll rise above the game
You won’t forget my name
Yeah I don’t mind...

songs.embed_content: Read “Will” by Nemo Schiffman on Genius
songs.title: Will
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Make me come to life
I promise you the earth. Ask me now
I'll take you now
Take you to the sky
And teach you how to fly. Wanna go high
Just you & I...

Can’t you see
Everything
In my mind
I can climb
I want you
To know
Everywhere
I could find
Just a piece
Of your mind
I want to, Go...

[Chorus]
And we'll become one, yes we will ! We’ll become one yes we will ! X2

[Verse 2]
Listen to the sound
My heart is knocking loud. Trust me now
Just trust me now...

Can’t you see
In my mind
Everything’s
Upside down
I love you, So...

[Chorus]
And we'll become one yes we will ! We’ll become one yes we will ! X2

[Bridge]
Innocent
Realize
Everything
Anyone
Innocent
Realize
Everything X2

[Chorus]
And we'll become one yes we will! We’ll become one yes we will ! X2
For everyone... For anything... And will!
